input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Are you looking for a fun and exciting toy for your child? Well, look no further than the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile! This toy comes with a fun and engaging design that will keep your child entertained for hours on end. The Batmobile comes with a unique feature that allows your child to shake it up to start the "engine" and then watch as it races off on its own. The more your child shakes it up, the longer it will go! This toy also comes with cool phrases that will be sure to get your child excited and engaged in the fun! Whether your child is a fan of the DC Super Friends or just loves fun toys, they are sure to love this Batmobile!
input_text.Response B: The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile offers kids a fun way to engage in pretend play while developing their gross motor skills.  This Batmobile features shake-activated motion and sound effects, along with cool phrases that are activated by letting go.  The Batmobile also features iconic design details from the popular DC Comics character, including a light-up nose cone and a detachable Batman figure.  Kids will love collecting all of the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles and engaging in super hero themed imaginative play.  This Batmobile is recommended for kids ages 3 years and older, and it requires 3 LR44 batteries (included).  The Batmobile measures approximately 9"L x 5"W x 6"H.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback:
Both could do with better formatting in their responses.
B gets a bit too technical at the end with "9"L x 5"W x 6"H.".
